title: Sudden FPS Drop
body: So as of up till now I've been playing on a decent 60 fps but as of today when I launched a league match I found I only had 10-12 fps I have not changed any of the settings  so this is a bit puzzling  also I rand the hextech repair tool  showed that nothing is wrong .

replies.body: Sudden FPS issues could be happening for a few reasons like game files, drivers, or even your PC getting overworked.  Using the HRT was a solid step, and there's a few more things to try.  Check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
